title: HAS_VEHICLE_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_BULLETS
content:
0xB8AF3137// HasVehicleBeenDamagedByBullets
BOOL HAS_VEHICLE_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_BULLETS(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.Returns: Returns whether or not the target vehicle has been damaged by bullets.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for HAS_VEHICLE_BEEN_DAMAGED_BY_BULLETS
HasVehicleBeenDamagedByBullets(vehicle)
